citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:19 pm on
30-JUL-19.
The inspector knocked on the door, and called the numbers provided. The inspector spoke to the licensee who
indicated they were out of state, and therefore unavailable for an inspection.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:19 pm on
30-JUL-19.
The inspector knocked on the door, and called the numbers provided.  The inspector spoke to the licensee who
indicated they were out of state, and therefore unavailable for an inspection.
